nodes.text: Ultimate Factivity Collection: Angry Birds Star Wars
Ultimate Factivity Collection: Angry Birds Star Wars is a children's activity book from the Angry Birds Star Wars series. It was released on December 15, 2014.

A fact-packed activity book filled with all your favorite crazy characters from the Angry Birds Star Wars game. DK's Ultimate Factivity Collection: Angry Birds Star Wars is a thrilling combination of exciting facts and fun activities featuring the Rebel bird heroes and Pork Side villains from the popular game. Engaging reference material guides the child through each activity, while exciting challenges, fun stickers and absorbing puzzles inspire creativity!
